game.title: The Last Hope
game.beginning: In a post-apocalyptic world, humanity is on the brink of extinction. A deadly virus has wiped out most of the population, and those who remain are struggling to survive.
game.ending: After discovering a cure for the virus, the player must journey across the treacherous wasteland to find a safe haven and rebuild society.
game.synopsis: The Last Hope is a story-driven RPG where players take on the role of a survivor in a desperate bid to save humanity. As they navigate through ruins of once-great cities, encounter hostile factions vying for power, and uncover secrets about the virus, the player must make tough decisions that will shape the future of their world.
